title: Sign Out a Piece of Equipment
description: A carpenter needs to use a power saw from the on-site tool crib. The tool crib manager must log the checkout.

tasks.description: Identify the specific power saw by its asset ID number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct asset ID is identified.

tasks.description: Log in the equipment tracking system that the saw has been checked out by the specified carpenter.
tasks.expected_outcome: The checkout is successfully logged, assigning the tool to the carpenter.
